#### Our mission is to connect, enrich, educate and lead

#### through the inspiring power of the arts and creative discovery.

* * *

**SAC Uptown Gallery Shop is open:**

Monday – Saturday 10am – 5pm | Sundays 12noon – 5pm

928-282-3865

**SAC Administrative Office hours are:**

Monday – Friday 9am – 5pm

928-282-3809

 _**The Administrative Office will be closed on Monday, January 19, 2026, for the Federal Holiday._

**Special Exhibition Gallery (SEG) hours (during exhibitions) are:**

Monday – Sunday 12pm – 5pm

### Gallery Shop

### Current Exhibition

Sedona Arts Center’s Gallery Shop showcases the largest selection in Sedona of artwork by local artists. If you are seeking a rare piece of fine art, a gift of exquisite jewelry, appreciate stunning photography, or looking for a lovely keepsake from your visit to Sedona, the A...
